FuncDef: This command specifies the value used as the fast retry timer for a secondary path. If the first attempt to set up a secondary path fails due to a path error, the fast retry timer will be started for the secondary path so that the path can be retried sooner. If the next attempt also fails, further retries for the path will use the configured value for LSP retry timer.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the value (in seconds), used as the fast retry timer for a secondary path. Values-1 to 10.
